data.name: Not Without You
data.detailed_description:
The Pilcri have been captured! You must save them! Not Without You is an insanely clever 2D puzzle brain-teaser, created by mad scientists! What's insane about it? First, the Pilcri all move in unison - one moves left, they ALL move left! And, all exits must be covered at the same time. How can you help? Utilize the environment, to best position them to successfully flee - through the trap doors in each level!

Not Without You is a fresh, modern take on classic puzzle mechanics that's accessible to gamers of all ages, yet challenging enough for hardened problem-solvers. While targeted at mobile users, it is still addictive on PCs and Macs. How ‚Äúaddictive‚Äù? How‚Äôs a 37-minute median session time (the median amount of time played by customers like you, each time this game is opened)? The average is much longer! Sounds like an excellent babysitter - or daily escape - doesn‚Äôt it?

KEY FEATURES:

Move in Unison - All Pilcri move in the same direction at the same time
Plentiful Puzzles - Hours of levels that entertain, tease and challenge your mind!
Brain Builder - Practice your strategic thinking, spatial relations, and scientific methodology!
Magical World - Hand-crafted art that offers endless wonder!
Pay Just Once - Play as much as you want! No ads! No micro-transactions! FREE updates!

It's cute, not easy. And, if you get addicted, don't say we didn't warn you. Are you a puzzle Hero? Save the Pilcri!

Not Without You is one of many titles in Burnout Game Ventures' pipeline, a portfolio of which is provided by Adventure Beard, LLC, a joint venture between Bad Pilcrow, Inc. (the IP holder), Major Games, Inc. (one of BGV‚Äôs Client Partners), and BGV. Burnout Game Ventures, where we incubate game companies from zero-to-sales in six months or less!

data.short_description: An insanely clever 2D puzzle game, designed by mad scientists! Are you a puzzle Hero? Save the Pilcri!
data.reviews:
‚ÄúWhen I first had the pleasure to try this game, I was hooked. I had to save all the Pilcri and get 3 stars for every level. Some levels are straightforward and easy, but some are really hard to figure out and even harder to get 3 stars on. You really have to think and strategize which is something I really enjoy doing. For added replay value, try going for a perfect score. Completing each level in the lowest number of moves is even more of a challenge. Some scores will seem impossible to get, but it's so satisfying when you do get it. Can you save all the Pilcri and beat an existing low score? With more worlds coming, there's plenty more to look forward to and more challenges ahead. Thank you for letting me play this game! - David Cruz, 2X Guinness Book of Video Game World Records holder‚Äù
5 Stars ‚Äì Google Play

‚ÄúI'm so glad I discovered this sweet game! It's a fun way to pass the time while exercising your brain at the same time. It's simple, yet engrossing. I highly recommend it.‚Äù
5 Stars ‚Äì Google Play

‚ÄúLevel up without a big time-sink üëçüëç I love this game. It uses familiar themes for this genre, which makes it easy to jump in and play. But, its puzzles are unique, which make it fun and fresh. Highly recommend for anyone who want a quick gaming fix on the go.‚Äù
5 Stars ‚Äì Apple App Store

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G3900 or Greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9-compatible graphics card with at least 1GB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • Additional Notes: 64 BiT Operating System Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB of video memory
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • Additional Notes: 64 BiT Operating System Required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
